item.title: Leafs Blocking Road Drains, 3rd November
item.description:
Significant amount of leafs have falen on both sides of southwalk bridge road and on the pavements near mint st park. They are blocking the road drainage causing flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Bridge Road, The Borough, London

item.title: Footpath needs a tidy up, 3rd November

item.title: Wrong sign, 3rd November

item.title: Disturbance of the peace outside residential flats, 3rd November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Luke Street, London

item.title: Camp dump to be removed, 3rd November
item.description:
Waste left from a group of rough sleepers who have been camping there for few days. Police were contacted yesterday and moved them on but advised they may come back due to the camp there and request these be moved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Bell Yard Mews, Old Kent Road, London
